modName: Vibrant Cyan and Gold Glass Armour and Weapons
summary: A simple blue and golden reskin of the Glass weapons and armour.
descriptionHtml:
A simple reskin of the Glass weapons and armour. Like there\'s not enough already :P
It brightens the gold and changes the dull green into a bright blue/cyan with a jewel like finish.
I really made this for my self but thought sod it might as well release it on Nexus.

To Install: simply put the Data folder in Skyrim\'s root folder
To uninstall: Remove the \"glass\" folders from the following directories:
Skyrim/Data/textures/armour
Skyrim/Data/textures/weapons
author: NickNak
